name: Roasted Squash, Spinach & Rice Salad
description: Using whole-grain brown rice ups the fibre content and is easier to digest. If you don’t have brown rice, swap in whole-wheat pasta, couscous, or quinoa.

ingredients.name: low sodium soy sauce or gluten free soy sauce

preparation: Place squash on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner. Drizzle oil and honey over squash. Season with Sea Salt and Black Pepper. Toss to coat. Roast until squash is tender, about 20 minutes.
Turn squash into a large bowl and add rice and spinach. Drizzle with dressing, then gently stir to mix. Serve warm or refrigerate until chilled. Salad will keep well up to 3 days.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
